<iframe width="853" height="480" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/sEwa2q5dgQw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Needs a bit of tweaking for placement of the solar panels and a couple of decouplers to stop the fairings from moving prior to deployment. I may remove a some of the ion engines as well

That looks awesome!

A quick question, you seem to use the damned robotics mod here, but ever since 0.17 I have had troubles with DR. Whenever I time warp or go to the space center and back the pieces attached to joints and moving parts get all out of alignment. Is there something I'm missing? I have the latest mumech.lib. Thanks.

Also fellow Wisconsinite! Go pack go!
The key seems to be to make sure the hinges and stuff are in their starting position before warping, although usually my stuff will pop back into place after warp.

The key seems to be to make sure the hinges and stuff are in their starting position before warping, although usually my stuff will pop back into place after warp.

Yeah, that seems to be what works for me as well. Not too bad for some things, but on others it can be killer. My space stations grappling arm for docking is nearly inoperable at this point. I hope it gets fixed soon, but this seems unlikely.
I can't wait for it to be revealed
defiantly very cool I sure can't replicate it but it needs....a big laser!
